turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order an iced vanilla latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Peet's Coffee in Santa Cruz on Mission Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what size did you want that drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order is for 1 medium iced vanilla latte from peet's in santa cruz on mission street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now? the total is $4.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order, it'll b ready for pick up in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, enjoy the drink. i've sent the receipt to your phone.
